Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies have lost four of their last five games following a win.
The Cubs have won each of their last three games against National League opponents following a loss.
The Phillies have failed to cover the run line in seven of their last eight games against National League opponents following a home win.
The Cubs have covered the run line in 15 of their last 20 games against the Phillies at Citizens Bank Park following a loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs have already been eliminated from the playoffs.
The Phillies scored six runs on Monday and that was enough for the four-run victory.
The Cubs' offense is averaging 4.57 runs per game.
The Phillies' offense is averaging 4.87 runs, while their pitching is giving up 4.08 runs per game.
Kyle Schwarber has hit 36 home runs and driven in 99 RBIs so far this season.
The Phillies will meet the Nats after this series.
Others: Shane Mickle predicts the Chicago Cubs to win against the Philadelphia Phillies on the money line.
Justin Steele will start for the Cubs with a 5-5 record and an ERA of 3.03.
Taijuan Walker will start for the Phillies with a 3-7 record and an ERA of 6.91.
